QuestData.Title: The Fate of the Doyles
QuestData.Description: It seems the Doyles already joined their last fight. Iain will want to know of their fate.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return the news of Clan Doyle to Iain Firebeard at the Firebeard Cemetery.
QuestData.RewardText: That's a right shame. Stubborn as they were to speak to, they were just as stubborn in a fight. Would have been good to have 'em.$B$BOnce this is done, we'll have to send some boys out to bring them back for a proper send off.
